params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.tokenId: The NFT identifier which is being transferred

devdoc.title: ERC-6551 Smart Account (TBA) for NFT-based ownership & Alchemy AA compatible

executeCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Executes a call on behalf of the account

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).notice: EIP-1271 signature validator for contract wallets

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: Handle the receipt of an NFT

owner().notice: Returns the owner (current holder of NFT)

token().notice: Returns the token that owns this account

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw native tokens (e.g. MON/ETH) from this TBA to NFT holder EOA
